Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory61.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No abnormalities in all areas. All Corrupted cleared.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The tactical terminal has been found, but there were no clues about the sound of singing. Could it be that Liv heard it wrong?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The sound of singing... is coming from the tactical terminal.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll go check it now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Condelina', 3: "W-who's here?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're the Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv has actually made the first move?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant, does this way of talking sound familiar to you in terms of frequency?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv and Condelina... Perhaps that's why Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of Condelina's memory on the terminal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv and Condelina... I can't say for sure. But perhaps that's why Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of Condelina's memory on the terminal.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Pardon me, I heard the sound of singing just now. I guess it's from you...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Condelina', 3: "Ah, that's embarrassing! My voice must be awful... I'm sooo sorry!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Not at all! You have a beautiful voice! I even forgot about the battle since I was totally attracted to it...', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "According to the data, memory type: Condelina, one of the members of the Moe Army, also a first-class assassin. Records also show that she's introverted and shy with a passion for singing...", 4: '1'}
{2: "She doesn't seem like that...", 3: '42', 4: 'Such a sharp contrast...', 5: '43'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Well, the memory integrity test passed. No signs of Punishing Virus corruption were detected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...The memory integrity test passed. No signs of Punishing Virus corruption were detected.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, I've explained the current situation to Condelina and she agreed to assist us. But...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, I'd like to ask Condelina to sing for us at the end of our recycle mission...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Condelina has such a sweet voice! Can I ask for your approval?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I see.', 3: '50', 4: 'You have my permission.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...How long do we have to stand here like this?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'After all, Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of singing from Condelina, but at least...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's not every day that Liv finds something she loves.", 3: '61', 4: "Let's wait a little longer, Lee...", 5: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Seems that there's no other choice. I see...", 4: '1'}
